definition: see 冬蟲夏草|冬虫夏草[dong1 chong2 xia4 cao3]
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: As a result, the broth of Cordyceps militaris fermentation contained antimicrobial active substances.
sentences.chinese: 蛹虫草发酵液中具有抗菌活性物质。

sentences.english: Occurrence of major diseases, pest-insects and weeds in rice-crab field were surveyed.
sentences.chinese: 对养蟹稻田主要病虫草害的发生规律进行调查。

sentences.english: Research showed that various conditions will affect the growth of Cordycepts Militars.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明多种培养条件影响蛹虫草生长。

sentences.english: And list the Crodyceps having been discovered in this area during the past years.
sentences.chinese: 并列出了历年来滇黔桂喀斯特地区发现的虫草菌。

sentences.english: In international market, the price of 3'-deoxyadenosine is very expensive.
sentences.chinese: 在国际市场上，虫草素的价格非常昂贵。

sentences.english: Ten years' wine -Wuliangye, mixed with Worm grass, made up Dadaohexie Wuliangye.
sentences.chinese: 大道和谐五粮液，十年陈酒虫草镶。

sentences.english: Conclusion The culture cycle of Cordyceps militaris fruiting body can be shortened by this method.
sentences.chinese: 结论该方法缩短了北虫草子实体的培养周期。

sentences.english: Chinese Caterpillar Fungus is a precious medicine in Tibetan Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 冬虫草，高原稀有的药珍贵药材。

sentences.english: The experiment had studied the effect of nourishing Yin and strengthening kidney.
sentences.chinese: 实验研究了虫草膏的滋阴补肾作用。

sentences.english: The help of the railway police, named Ma and Zhou retrieve precious Chinese caterpillar fungus.
sentences.chinese: 在铁路公安的帮助下，马某和周某找回宝贵的虫草。

sentences.english: From natural Cordyceps sinensis, the sand has to be artificially cultivated Cordyceps old.
sentences.chinese: 冬虫夏草来自天然，可老沙却要人工培育虫草。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the method of inducing Cordyceps militaris fruiting body by simulating natural conditions.
sentences.chinese: 目的模拟自然条件刺激的方法诱导北虫草产生子实体。

sentences.english: The max dose was measured by the acute toxicity tests.
sentences.chinese: 急性毒性试验测定虫草洋参胶囊的最大耐受量。

sentences.english: As a result, the synthesis of 3'-deoxyadenosine was investigated in many laboratories.
sentences.chinese: 因此，许多实验室对虫草素的合成进行了研究。

sentences.english: The anti-aging effect of Cordyceps gunnii(Berk.
sentences.chinese: 研究古尼虫草多糖的抗衰老作用。

sentences.english: Anyway, caterpillar fungus is one of the traditional Chinese tonics . It's good for your health.
sentences.chinese: 总之，虫草是一处中药补药，有益于身体健康。

definition: matsutake (Tricholoma matsutake), edible mushroom considered a great delicacy in Japan
young deer antler prior to ossification (used in TCM)
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
the bulb of the fritillary (Fritillaria thunbergii)
